## Calm, Crisp, Collected
Our Chardonnay comes from the Eola-Amity Hills AVA. This area boasts Pacific Ocean Breezes, volcanic soil and an Eastern exposure that comes together to create a beautiful wine. 12.9% ALC/VOL
